attributes.review: Sorry to say this but the app runs very poorly, and every time I open the app I get scared because I see an oversized Cheeto on the screen.. I didn’t realize I was downloading a scary game... please fix the pictures... I had to delete it after I downloaded it... I almost passed out 3 times...
attributes.title: App is laggy✨🏳️‍🌈🧚‍♂️🥰

attributes.review:
every time i opened the app it would automatically order rats to my home. i don’t know how to stop this. i don’t know how it’s doing this. 
for the love of god make it stop
there is also a very ugly man featured throughout the app i would like to see less of him he’s not good to look at
attributes.title: Just Horrible

attributes.review: this app is not the best, the buttons do not work very well and it takes forever to load. customer service is horrible, i called them with concerns because i was not able to open the app. the person who answered me refused to serve me once he learned my political beliefs. he repeatedly called me a “stupid lib”, “snowflake” and “clown”. once i asked for his managers number, he threatened to travel to my house. i was able to trace the call and find his address, and after saying “this you?” he hung up. awful people.
attributes.title: glitchy app, too aggressive

attributes.review: If I could I would rate it 0 stars! It spams me with text messages and I hate that you have to give it your location! I don’t wanna the Oompa Loompa knowing where I live! 🤮 I seriously hope that this app gets taken down, and that this horrible horrible, Cheeto looking man gets taken out of Office!
attributes.title: Horrible App🤢🤢

attributes.review: This app is terrible I honestly think I got blinded when I opened the app so if u vote for trump you are voting for a slob and I just think it is terrible to have a man that scares children with his is face is a terrible thing and then this app makes it even worse so like I want to know why his parents haven’t disowned him

as excited as i was for this app, it is safe to say i am extremely disappointed and disgusted. the app glitches out nonstop and has even caused my phone to lag when not using the app itself, the notifications don’t come through plus more. HORRIBLE
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: First of all I opened the app to find a horribly disfigured Cheeto 🤮🧚🏽‍♀️💅🏽 That picture itself should be a crime!! I ended up having to stab my eyeballs out it hurts so much👩🏽‍🦯👁👄👁.  When I got off the app my screen turned into the picture of a Cheeto getting a spray tan and it’s balls were the size of a pebble
attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes

attributes.review: I opened the app and it immediately starting glitching. I had to exit out of the app 32 times and shut my phone off about 5 times to finally get it to work. Even then, it was extremely slow and frustrating. Wouldn’t recommend.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: This app has truly taken the cake for the worst thing i have ever laid eyes on. I was immediately punched in the face with horrific visuals consisting of a skinned beluga whale screaming into a crowd. DisgUSTING. GROSS. INSULTING. UNAMERICAN. I CAN NEVER AND WILL NEVER VOTE FOR TRUMP THANKS TO THE PTSD I NOW SUFFER FROM. THIS APP HAS TAKEN MY LIBERTY TO BREATHE WITHOUT WHEEZING. I KNOW WHISTLE THROUGH MY NOSE. Trump has snatched my wig as well as my vital organs. I would not recommend to a friend.
attributes.title: Trump has snatched my wig as well as my vital organs

attributes.review: I opened the app and Bloody Mary came out of it and farted on my face it was absolutely absurd. Then after that horrific experience it automatically switched to a picture of Trump doing awful things we do not speak of . This app is sooo slow and glitchy. Your worst fears pop out of the screen. DO NOT GET IT.
attributes.title: Auto falacioing man
